Men

The Men’s Ministry enables men in the church to connect with one another, encourage each other and grow together in God. We want to see men thrive in the church; committed and contributing; fathers to the fatherless and disciples in the likeness of Christ, demonstrating a steadfast love that is inspiring and infectious.

We hold various men’s meetings throughout the year and a Men’s Connect Group that meet on various occasions throught the year.

Register below to join the Men group

I Have Decided

If you or a friend have recently made the life-transforming decision to follow Jesus, we want to help you as best as we can.

New to Church?

Find more about who we are and what we believe.

Groups

Our groups are relational, personal and informal. Meeting together every week to build friendships to share and process life's experiences.

Mental Health and Wellbeing

Content, resources and information for overall well-being

Resources

Video content, podcasts and devotionals designed to empower you in your walk of birth.

Speak to Pastor

We have pastors and team that would love to contact you to ensure that you are connected and supported.
